root.name: Saber Rider and the Star Sheriffs
root.description: OverviewVery little is known of this game, except that it has been announced by German-based developer Firehazard Studio who has purchased the rights to make videogames based on the classic 80's animated series from rights-holders World Events Productions.In addition to being in development for the Nintendo 3DS, the game is also being developed for Apple devices like the iPhone, XBLA, PSN and Steam.The game is currently scheduled for release in 2012.The game will include many classic characters that fans know and love from the series, and will also feature an "awesome" soundtrack from Chris Huelsbeck, to quote the developers.The developers promise that they're game will do justice to the fans and the source material, stating that it has been a childhood dream of Chris Strauß, the Managing Director.To quote:Ever since my childhood, Saber Rider and the Star Sheriffs has been a part of my life. I have always wanted a video game based on the series. Finally, this wish seems to have a chance of becoming a reality. Along with millions of other fans since Saber Rider and the Star Sheriffs hit our airwaves in the 80s, we at Firehazard Studio have all been in love with the powerful Star Sheriffs and there almighty Starship Ramrod and we couldn’t be more thrilled to see Saber Rider and the Star Sheriffs the very first time on a gaming device such as the Nintendo 3DS.
